Need To Know

Need To Know

 

Trump Charges Dropped

The judge overseeing the Jan. 6 election interference case against President-elect Donald Trump [dropped charges](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hYmNuZXdzLmdvLmNvbS9VUy9zcGVjaWFsLWNvdW5zZWwtamFjay1zbWl0aC1tb3Zlcy1kaXNtaXNzLWVsZWN0aW9uLWludGVyZmVyZW5jZS9zdG9yeT9pZD0xMTYyMDc3NTgmY2lkPXNvY2lhbF90d2l0dGVyX2FiY24/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B1b0d9689) yesterday, following a request from Special Counsel Jack Smith. Smith similarly moved to dismiss charges against Trump, accusing him of illegally retaining [classified documents](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYmJjLmNvbS9uZXdzL2FydGljbGVzL2N4Mm40eDFwNzBybw/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bf35bb4b4) after leaving office.  

In filings ([read here](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZG9jdW1lbnRjbG91ZC5vcmcvZG9jdW1lbnRzLzI1NDAyNDUzLXRydW1wMTEyNQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B8f1b9693)), Smith said his view of the case remained unchanged but cited the Justice Department's long-standing legal perspective that federal prosecution of a sitting president is unconstitutional. In the election interference case, prosecutors alleged Trump conspired to interfere with the 2020 election and obstruct the official certification of electoral votes ([see previous write-up](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9qb2luMTQ0MC5jb20vbmV3c2xldHRlci90cnVtcC1pbmRpY3RtZW50LWhlbnJpZXR0YS1sYWNrcy1hbmQtYW1lcmljYXMtYmVzdC1ob3NwaXRhbHM/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B36ff27b8)).

Charges were brought last August, with the trial delayed by a legal challenge in which the Supreme Court ultimately ruled former presidents [have some immunity](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuc2NvdHVzYmxvZy5jb20vMjAyNC8wNy9qdXN0aWNlcy1ydWxlLXRydW1wLWhhcy1zb21lLWltbXVuaXR5LWZyb20tcHJvc2VjdXRpb24v/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B2fa83380) to criminal prosecution for acts in office. Smith subsequently refiled updated charges 10 weeks ahead of the election. 

In related news, the president-elect said yesterday evening he would look to [impose 25% tariffs](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvdHJ1bXAtdGFyaWZmcy1jYW5hZGEtbWV4aWNvLWNoaW5hLTU5MjM5YWZlMTIwMzNjYTk5YzY1YzdhMmJlMGU0ZjBk/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B82a35abc) on all goods coming from Canada and Mexico and additional tariffs on Chinese goods on his first day back in office. 

 

Israel Weighs Hezbollah Deal

Israel's Cabinet is expected to vote today on the terms of a proposed [ceasefire deal](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly90aGVoaWxsLmNvbS9wb2xpY3kvZGVmZW5zZS81MDA4MTY5LWNlYXNlZmlyZS1kZWFsLWlzcmFlbC1oZXpib2xsYWgv/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B81820f07) with Hezbollah in Lebanon.

The deal'which does not cover the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza'would reportedly include a 60-day Israeli withdrawal from southern Lebanon as Hezbollah fighters move north of the Litani River ([see map](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudW5kZXJzdGFuZGluZ3dhci5vcmcvYmFja2dyb3VuZGVyL3VuZGVyc3RhbmRpbmctaXNyYWVsJUUyJTgwJTk5cy1jYW1wYWlnbi1kZWZlYXQtaGV6Ym9sbGFoLWxlYmFub24/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B53256dc4)). The Lebanese army would monitor the border in a process overseen by five countries, led by the US and France. Israel could continue to take military action to disrupt Hezbollah's ability to smuggle weapons and reestablish a border presence.

Hezbollah renewed its [conflict with Israel](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2ZyLm9yZy9iYWNrZ3JvdW5kZXIvd2hhdC1oZXpib2xsYWg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B6a6c0dbd) on Oct. 8, 2023, launching thousands of rockets into the country following Hamas' Oct. 7 attacks. Since then, around 60,000 people have been displaced in Israel and more than 1 million people in Lebanon. Israeli attacks in Lebanon'including a ground invasion this year'have killed more than 3,500 people and wounded over 15,000 others; Hezbollah attacks have killed around 140 people in Israel.

 

Dancing in the Mini Moonlight

Earth's temporary ['mini moon,'](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvZWFydGgtbWluaS1tb29uLWFkZmIyMmZhODJhMDFkMTY4YzFiNjYzYWNmMTBlYjky/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B06f7d11a) a 33-foot asteroid known as 2024 PT5, is departing after spending two months near our planet. The space rock began its horseshoe-shaped path around Earth in late September but was never fully captured as a true satellite.

Scientists believe the bus-sized rock may be a chunk of our [own moon](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubGl2ZXNjaWVuY2UuY29tL3NwYWNlL2FzdGVyb2lkcy9lYXJ0aHMtbGF0ZXN0LW1pbmltb29uLWNvdWxkLWJlLWEtY2h1bmstb2Ytb3VyLXBsYW5ldHMtcGVybWFuZW50LW1vb24tYW5kLWl0cy1hYm91dC10by1sZWF2ZS11cy1iZWhpbmQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bf29edb47) based on its composition and characteristics, finding its makeup closely matches lunar samples collected by Russian and NASA missions in the past. The asteroid's spectral characteristics resemble material from the moon's [maria regions](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9tYXNoYWJsZS5jb20vYXJ0aWNsZS9mYXItc2lkZS1kYXJrLW1vb24tZXhwbGFpbmVk/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bee6732e1)'dark lunar areas formed by ancient lava flows'suggesting it may have been ejected from a lunar crater millions of years ago.

The asteroid will make a brief reappearance in January, passing within 1.1 million miles of our planet'about five times the distance from Earth to the moon. After the flyby, it won't return until 2055.

**_In partnership with Babbel_**

Learn A New Language, See the World

 

[![](https://images.chamaileon.io/603e31c9224efc2a1990854e/606c622893b338dbb0569766/1633979088137_Babbel%20Logo.png)](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397C0f828fbd)

Henry Ford said, 'Anyone who stops learning is old, at 20 or 80. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.' What better way to [**continue educating yourself**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397D0f828fbd) than by exploring the world. If you're worried about the language barrier'meet Babbel.

Babbel helps you [**start speaking a new language**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397E0f828fbd) in just _three weeks_. Seriously. Things have changed a bit since the days of flashcards and vocab quizzes. Designed by 150 linguists, Babbel uses podcasts, games, live online classes, and other proven methods to [**make you conversational quickly**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397F0f828fbd). Plus, get pronunciation tips and cultural context for each of the 14 languages offered. 

Don't wait for the perfect time or the perfect trip'[**start learning today**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397G0f828fbd) and you'll run out of reasons to push that vacation off for another year. For a limited time, 1440 readers can take advantage of their biggest discount ever: [**67% off while their Black Friday Sale lasts!**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397H0f828fbd)

In The Know

 

Sports, Entertainment, & Culture

**\>** **General Motors to join** Formula 1 as its 11th team beginning in 2026 under GM's Cadillac brand ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZXNwbi5jb20vZjEvc3RvcnkvXy9pZC80MjYwNTk0OC9mb3JtdWxhLTEtYXBwcm92ZXMtZ20tMTF0aC10ZWFtLWdyaWQtMjAyNi1zZWFzb24_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1qb2luMTQ0MCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9wbGFjZW1lbnQ9bmV3c2xldHRlcg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bec2a9113))

**\>** **Elton John loses** eyesight in his right eye for last four months due to an infection ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudXNhdG9kYXkuY29tL3N0b3J5L2VudGVydGFpbm1lbnQvbXVzaWMvMjAyNC8xMS8yNS9lbHRvbi1qb2huLXZpc2lvbi1sb3NzLWV5ZXNpZ2h0Lzc2NTY2NjQ5MDA3Lz90YnJlZj1ocD91dG1fc291cmNlPWpvaW4xNDQwJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3BsYWNlbWVudD1uZXdzbGV0dGVy/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bd10858df)) | **Barbara Taylor Bradford**, romance novelist best known for "A Woman of Substance," dies at age 91 ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubmJjbmV3cy5jb20vbmV3cy9vYml0dWFyaWVzL2JhcmJhcmEtdGF5bG9yLWJyYWRmb3JkLWRpZXMtcmNuYTE4MTYxMj91dG1fc291cmNlPWpvaW4xNDQwJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3BsYWNlbWVudD1uZXdzbGV0dGVy/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Baf1acbc4))

 

Science & Technology

**\>** **Chipmaker Nvidia** debuts Fugatto, an AI model that creates audio from text prompts and can modify existing songs ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZW5nYWRnZXQuY29tL2FpL252aWRpYXMtbmV3LWFpLW1vZGVsLWZ1Z2F0dG8tY2FuLWNyZWF0ZS1hdWRpby1mcm9tLXRleHQtcHJvbXB0cy0xNDAwMTcyOTcuaHRtbD91dG1fc291cmNlPWpvaW4xNDQwJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3BsYWNlbWVudD1uZXdzbGV0dGVy/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bee80ea0a)) | **How generative AI works** in simple terms ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZS5jb20vd2F0Y2g_dj1iY18wcG40T3JEYw/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B26ea01a4), w/video)

**\>** **Neuroscientists pinpoint** brain circuit responsible for the rejection of mating partners by female mammals ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9pbnRlcmVzdGluZ2VuZ2luZWVyaW5nLmNvbS9zY2llbmNlL3NleHVhbC1yZWplY3Rpb24tbmV1cm9uLWZlbWFsZS1tYW1tYWxzP3V0bV9zb3VyY2U9am9pbjE0NDAmdXRtX21lZGl1bT1lbWFpbCZ1dG1fcGxhY2VtZW50PW5ld3NsZXR0ZXI/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Baf5a34db)) | **Elon Musk's Neuralink** to launch feasibility study of brain implant that can control robotic arms ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucGNtYWcuY29tL25ld3MvbmV1cmFsaW5rLXByZXBzLWJyYWluLWNoaXAtdGhhdC1jYW4tY29udHJvbC1yb2JvdGljLWFybXM/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Be97cb953))

**\>** **Researchers unearth** the oldest firearm in the US, a bronze cannon used during a 16th-century Spanish expedition into the southwest ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9waHlzLm9yZy9uZXdzLzIwMjQtMTEtb2xkZXN0LWZpcmVhcm0tdW5lYXJ0aGVkLWFyaXpvbmEtYnJvbnplLmh0bWw_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1qb2luMTQ0MCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9wbGFjZW1lbnQ9bmV3c2xldHRlcg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Ba542ed90)) 

 

Business & Markets

**\>** **US stock markets** close higher (S&P 500 +0.3%, Dow +1.0%, Nasdaq +0.3%) following news President-elect Donald Trump selects hedge fund manager Scott Bessent to lead the Treasury Department ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9maW5hbmNlLnlhaG9vLmNvbS9uZXdzL2xpdmUvc3RvY2stbWFya2V0LXRvZGF5LWRvdy1sZWFwcy00MDAtcG9pbnRzLXRvLWZyZXNoLWhpZ2gtYXMtd2FsbC1zdHJlZXQtY2hlZXJzLXRydW1wcy1waWNrLW9mLXNjb3R0LWJlc3NlbnQtMjEwMDQzMDU2Lmh0bWw_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1qb2luMTQ0MCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9wbGFjZW1lbnQ9bmV3c2xldHRlcg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B4422b8b3)) 

**\>** **Macy's delays reporting** Q3 earnings after discovering an employee hid as much as $154M in delivery expenses over the past three years; figures expected Dec. 11 ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyNC8xMS8yNS9tYWN5cy1wb3N0cy1wcmVsaW1pbmFyeS1yZXN1bHRzLWRlbGF5cy1mdWxsLWVhcm5pbmdzLXJlbGVhc2UuaHRtbD91dG1fc291cmNlPWpvaW4xNDQwJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3BsYWNlbWVudD1uZXdzbGV0dGVy/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bcfa73e78)) | **Kohl's CEO** to be replaced by Michaels CEO in January; transition marks company's third leadership change since 2018 ([More](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyNC8xMS8yNS9rb2hscy1jZW8tdG9tLWtpbmdzYnVyeS10by1zdGVwLWRvd24tcmVwbGFjZWQtYnktYXNobGV5LWJ1Y2hhbmFuLmh0bWw_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1qb2luMTQ0MCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9wbGFjZW1lbnQ9bmV3c2xldHRlcg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Be2c4b572))

**_In partnership with FinanceBuzz_**

**Why You Should Cancel Your Car Insurance**

**Why You Should Cancel Your Car Insurance**

You _could_ be wasting hundreds every year on overpriced insurance. The experts at FinanceBuzz believe they can help. 

If your rate went up in the last 12 months, [**check out this new tool from FinanceBuzz**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueXJ4dHJrLmNvbS9hZmZfYWQ_) to see if you're overpaying in just a few clicks! They match drivers with companies reporting savings of $600 or more per year when switching!\* Plus, once you use it, [**you'll always have access to the lowest rates**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueXJ4dHJrLmNvbS9hZmZfYWQ_); best yet, it's free. Answer a few easy questions to see how much you could be saving.

[**1440 readers ' See if you're overpaying now.**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueXJ4dHJrLmNvbS9hZmZfYWQ_)

_\*Savings vary based on driving history and discounts._

In-Depth

**\>** **Sitters and Standers**

**The Pudding** | **Alvin Chang**. Your position while working may say a lot about you'including your income bracket and work flexibility. See a visualization of the data on America's workers'and the great divide between standers and sitters. ([Watch](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZS5jb20vd2F0Y2g_dj1zRV9FdzBCZTRxRQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397C0d8ae506))

**\>** **Switched Before Birth**

 **New York Times Mag** | **Susan Dominus**. Two couples discover their babies were accidentally switched as embryos, leaving them asking: what now? ([Read](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubnl0aW1lcy5jb20vMjAyNC8xMS8yNS9tYWdhemluZS9pdmYtY2xpbmljLW1peHVwLmh0bWw_dW5sb2NrZWRfYXJ0aWNsZV9jb2RlPTEuYzA0LkxRVWgua2hyS1A5My1KZ0EtJnNtaWQ9dXJsLXNoYXJl/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B7b77bc8a))

**_In partnership with Babbel_**

15 Hours Of Babbel = 1 Semester At College

 

Impressive stat, right? You'll be even more impressed when you [**start speaking a new language in just three weeks**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397I0f828fbd)!

Used by avid travelers, lifelong learners, and everyday professionals, Babbel is [**the modern method to learn your dream language**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397J0f828fbd). No textbooks, flashcards, or vocab'Babbel utilizes a proven program designed by 150 linguists to help you become conversational in 10 minutes a day. [**Jetset your learning with 67% off Babbel during their Black Friday sale!**](https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397K0f828fbd)

"Life is like a 10-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use."

\- Charles M. Schulz

**Why 1440?** The printing press was invented around the year 1440, spreading knowledge to the masses and changing the course of history. More facts: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. We're here to make each one count.
